verses.verse: הוֹד֣וּ <S%H3034><s%> ho-Du O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov; for [he is] good כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

ה֭וֹדוּ <S%H3034><s%> Ho-du O give thanks לֵֽאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Hei unto the God הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; of gods כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

ה֭וֹדוּ <S%H3034><s%> Ho-du O give thanks לַאֲדֹנֵ֣י <S%H113><s%> la-'a-do-Nei to the Lord הָאֲדֹנִ֑ים <S%H113><s%> ha-'a-do-Nim; of lords כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְעֹ֘שֵׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> le-'O-Seh To him who alone doeth נִפְלָא֣וֹת <S%H6381><s%> nif-la-'ot wonders גְּדֹל֣וֹת <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lot great לְבַדּ֑וֹ <S%H905><s%> le-vad-Do; alone כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְעֹשֵׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> le-'o-Seh made הַ֭שָּׁמַיִם <S%H8064><s%> Hash-sha-ma-yim the heavens בִּתְבוּנָ֑ה <S%H8394><s%> bit-vu-Nah; To him that by wisdom כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְרֹקַ֣ע <S%H7554><s%> le-ro-Ka' To him that stretched out הָ֭אָרֶץ <S%H776><s%> Ha-'a-retz the earth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim; above the waters כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְ֭עֹשֵׂה <S%H6213><s%> Le-'o-seh To him that made אוֹרִ֣ים <S%H216><s%> o-Rim lights גְּדֹלִ֑ים <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lim; great כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַ֭שֶּׁמֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> Hash-she-mesh The sun לְמֶמְשֶׁ֣לֶת <S%H4475><s%> le-mem-She-let to rule בַּיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom; by day כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיָּרֵ֣חַ <S%H3394><s%> hai-ya-Re-ach The moon וְ֭כוֹכָבִים <S%H3556><s%> Ve-cho-cha-vim and stars לְמֶמְשְׁל֣וֹת <S%H4475><s%> le-mem-she-Lot to rule בַּלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> bal-La-ye-lah; by night כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְמַכֵּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> le-mak-Keh To him that smote מִ֭צְרַיִם <S%H4714><s%> Mitz-ra-yim Egypt בִּבְכוֹרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1060><s%> biv-cho-rei-Hem; in their firstborn כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

וַיּוֹצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-Tze And brought out יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'el Israel מִתּוֹכָ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> mit-to-Cham; from among כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. them for his mercy

בְּיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad hand חֲ֭זָקָה <S%H2389><s%> Cha-za-kah With a strong וּבִזְר֣וֹעַ <S%H2220><s%> u-viz-Ro-a' arm נְטוּיָ֑ה <S%H5186><s%> ne-tu-Yah; and with a stretched out כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְגֹזֵ֣ר <S%H1504><s%> le-go-Zer To him which divided יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> yam- sea ס֭וּף <S%H5488><s%> suf the Red לִגְזָרִ֑ים <S%H1506><s%> lig-za-Rim; into parts כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

וְהֶעֱבִ֣יר <S%H5674><s%> ve-he-'e-Vir to pass through יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El And made Israel בְּתוֹכ֑וֹ <S%H8432><s%> be-to-Cho; the midst כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. of it for his mercy

וְנִ֘עֵ֤ר <S%H5287><s%> ve-Ni-'Er But overthrew פַּרְעֹ֣ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh Pharaoh וְחֵיל֣וֹ <S%H2428><s%> ve-chei-Lo and his host בְיַם־ <S%H3220><s%> ve-yam- sea ס֑וּף <S%H5488><s%> Suf; in the Red כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְמוֹלִ֣יךְ <S%H1980><s%> le-mo-Lich led עַ֭מּוֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-mo his people בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar; through the wilderness כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְ֭מַכֵּה <S%H5221><s%> Le-mak-keh To him which smote מְלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim kings גְּדֹלִ֑ים <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lim; great כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

וַֽ֭יַּהֲרֹג <S%H2026><s%> Vai-ya-ha-rog And slew מְלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim kings אַדִּירִ֑ים <S%H117><s%> 'ad-di-Rim; famous כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

לְ֭סִיחוֹן <S%H5511><s%> Le-si-chon Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king הָאֱמֹרִ֑י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri; of the Amorites כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

וּ֭לְעוֹג <S%H5747><s%> U-le-'og And Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech the king הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan; of Bashan כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

וְנָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan And gave אַרְצָ֣ם <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tzam their land לְנַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> le-na-cha-Lah; for an heritage כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

נַ֭חֲלָה <S%H5159><s%> Na-cha-lah [Even] an heritage לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> le-Yis-ra-'El unto Israel עַבְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5650><s%> av-Do; his servant כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

שֶׁ֭בְּשִׁפְלֵנוּ <S%H8216><s%> be-shif-le-nu us in our low estate זָ֣כַר <S%H2142><s%> Za-char Who remembered לָ֑נוּ La-nu; כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

וַיִּפְרְקֵ֥נוּ <S%H6561><s%> vai-yif-re-Ke-nu And hath redeemed מִצָּרֵ֑ינוּ <S%H6862><s%> mitz-tza-Rei-nu; us from our enemies כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten Who giveth לֶ֭חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem food לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to all בָּשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> ba-Sar; to all flesh כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy

ה֭וֹדוּ <S%H3034><s%> Ho-du O give thanks לְאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> le-'El unto the God הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heaven כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> chas-Do. for his mercy
